casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
John DRUMMER, Jr. No. 2018-K-1139 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 11, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF AVOYELLES Writ denied. HUGHES, J., concurs and assigns reasons. Hughes, J., concurring.

The statement of the minor child to her father is properly admissible. However, the later statement to the police officer is not "res gestae." Nor is the "other crimes" evidence admissible. But given the totality of the evidence, these errors are harmless.
